item.description:
The alarms are sounding, the Red Sox have lost 9 of the first 11 games of the season. John Lackey is being skipped in the rotation. The Best Case Scenario now after Wednesdays rain out and tomorrows off day is that we start a winning streak on Friday. The Natives are getting restless with anxiety...

So it is time for our first ever Stitch & Bitch Game Watching Event at ScoreBoard. This is a Fundraiser for Teen Light Burlington and a joint event with the Craft and Conversation meetup and the Boston Social Anxiety meetup.

Join MaryEllen, Ann and anybody who wants to stitch, work on a craft project and bitch about the start of the red sox season while watching the Red Sox take on the Toronto Blue Jays from 1:30 to 4:30 pm on Sunday afternoon April 17 at ScoreBoard.  

If you have never been to Scoreboard, it is located at 15 Middlesex Canal Park next to the Holiday Inn and Showcase Cinema off Route 128 in Woburn. Scoreboard has 18 High Definition and Plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. More info at http://www.tpsscoreboard.com. There is free parking and limited T access by the 134 bus.

Arrive at 1:30pm.

There is no cover.

We will have a reserved section.

Game time is 1:35pm.

Includes complimentary popcorn, wings and treats from ScoreBoard.

Full Scoreboard menu available to order from.

Cash Bar

Watch the game.

Feel free to bring any craft project you are working on. All levels welcome.

Feel free to bitch if the Red Sox are still blowing games.  

Teen Light or "Teen Leaders Inspired to Give Hope to Teens" is a group of over 300 Burlington 8th graders raising money to address bullying.  

MaryEllen is participating in the Teen Light 5K Walk in Burlington on Saturday, June 4 at 9:30am. Feel free to contact her about joining the walk. Complete details and links will be updated on the Natives Event calendar.  

MaryEllen will be collecting optional donations to support her Teen Light fundraising goal of $ 500.00 to send a group to Project Adventure. A $15.00 optional on line donation ( http://maryellenm15.blogspot.com link to be active April 4) or a donation at the event gives you 5 tickets for our raffle. As an incentive each additional $1.00 donated gives you 1 more raffle ticket. Raffle drawing will take place at the event. Prizes will include Red Sox lottery tickets and a chance to win $1 Million Dollars!

Please remember to maintain your own food and bar tab and tip your servers. 

Attend early or later. Wear your best Sox gear. 

There is no cover, however please RSVP here and update so Scoreboard can set aside enough space for everyone. 

Get out and watch Baseball for a cause.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Lauren or the Scoreboard hostess to direct you to our the reserved section.
item.why: Free apps and its a good cause.
item.name: Stitch&Bitch&Watch Sox Game Fundraiser for Teen Light Burlington at ScoreBoard
